objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#c7e9ff;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#d9f0ff;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='frame-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#8e24aa;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#6a1b9a;stop-opacity:0.8'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg-gradient)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' fill='none' stroke='url(#frame-gradient)' stroke-width='4'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='15' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='200' cy='250' r='40' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.6'/><circle cx='350' cy='180' r='25' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='150' cy='400' r='60' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.4'/><circle cx='900' cy='200' r='50' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='800' cy='350' r='30' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='950' cy='450' r='45' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.6'/><circle cx='200' cy='700' r='55' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='300' cy='800' r='35' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.6'/><circle cx='100' cy='850' r='40' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.4'/><circle cx='850' cy='750' r='60' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='950' cy='850' r='45' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='700' cy='900' r='30' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.6'/><path d='M0,540 C180,480 360,600 540,540 C720,480 900,600 1080,540' stroke='#4CAF50' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3' fill='none'/><path d='M0,560 C180,620 360,500 540,560 C720,620 900,500 1080,560' stroke='#8E24AA' stroke-width='3' opacity='0.3' fill='none'/></svg>

objects.text:
Super Solution for Biggest Bubbles
Non-Toxic and Eco-Friendly
Won't Stain Clothing or Furniture
Hours of Colorful Fun for Kids

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
The banner presents a playful and colorful advertisement for a bubble solution product, designed to attract kids and parents. At the top, a bold title (`heading`) in vibrant purple grabs attention, followed by a fun green `subheading`. Beneath that is the `tagline`, which highlights the product's high quality in a stylish magenta font. A `description` further explains its features in clear, dark text for easy readability. The `price` is prominently displayed in bold purple and accented with a soft white bubble. Below, a green `cta_button` invites action with the `cta` text urging shoppers to engage. A realistic `product_image` of the bubble solution bottle sits on the right, balancing the layout. The background includes a soft gradient with semi-transparent bubbles and flowing lines, enhancing the lighthearted, clean theme.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: Light Sky Blue (#c7e9ff) to Pale Blue (#d9f0ff)
- Purple: #6a1b9a
- Magenta: #8e24aa
- Green: #4CAF50
- White: #FFFFFF
- Text Gray: #333333
product_color: The product image features a vibrant, playful color palette ideal for a children's advertisement. Dominantly green (#A1EF8B) is used in the translucent jug, conveying freshness and activity. The label blends purple (#8F4DC3) as a bold background with yellow (#FFD600) for the “BUBBLES” text, providing high contrast and cheerful energy. The "GAZILLION" text utilizes lime green (#C6F300) with blue (#2B4F97) and orange (#FF6F00) outlines, creating a layered, arcade-style look. Soft bubble gradients – including lavender (#D6CFFB), pastel pink (#F6C6E8), and light blue (#AFEFFF) – highlight the bubbly nature of the product, enhancing fun and whimsy. These vibrant colors are effectively balanced for visual appeal.
